entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink: RUC on derived virtual should not warn if base class has RUC #108090
    10.0.0
  • WinUI3 app compiled as AOT publishes managed pdb instead of native #108087
  • Trim analysis doesn't track AssemblyQualifiedName of a known type #108082
    10.0.0
  • Excessive context switching in FreeBSD dotnet ThreadPool worker threads #108079
  • `chrome-DebuggerTests` timing out #108078
    10.0.0
  • Test build failure: "coreclr Common Pri1 Test Build AnyOS AnyCPU checked" CI job fails #108076
  • The PipeWriter 'ResponseBodyPipeWriter' does not implement PipeWriter.UnflushedBytes #108075
  • WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations timeout #108074
    10.0.0
  • Include System.IO.Compression.Native in the PGO training set #108073
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.Inspector.OpenSessionAsync #108072
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.WasmHostProvider.LaunchHostAsync #108071
    10.0.0
  • System.Data.Common.Tests Assert failure on Linx x64 CI test run #108070
  • [aot] mono_aot_split_options handles \ incorrectly #108066
    10.0.0
  • Arm64 HWIntrinsics: Immediate methods should be testing with non-constants #108060
    10.0.0
  • Performance degradation in .Net 9 #108058
  • Updating to .net 6 causes higher lock contention #108057
  • [API Proposal]: MinSafeInteger and MaxSafeInteger constants for System.Single and System.Double #108055
  • Confusing API for taking items from BlockingCollection #108054
  • Access Violation in CastHelpers.IsInstanceOfInterface #108052
  • Exception event missing from activity in HttpClient native instrumentation #108050
  • Safely receiving bool return value from C++ using unmanaged delegate in C# #108047
  • `UnsafeAccessor` works with AOT but does not work with JIT for a type of Class<float> shape #108046

Closed

  • [profiler] It doesn't seem to be possible to get information about generic arguments of the defining class of a function from JIT compilation callbacks #107139
    10.0.0
  • Mono / .NET based Program crashing, won't start #108069
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 16 Regressions on 8/28/2024 6:34:28 PM #107302
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] PosixSignalRegistrationTests.ExternalConsoleManipulation_RegistrationRemoved_UnregisterSucceeds test crash #107412
    9.0.0
  • List<T>.Find() slower than System.Linq.FirstOrDefault() #108064
  • [Fuzzing] AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer: CultureNotFoundException: Culture is not supported #107949
    9.0.0
  • JsonElement.ToString() returns invalid json: "True"/"False" #107998
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'endOffset > startOffset' during 'Emit GC+EH tables' #106379
    10.0.0
  • Custom format strings with section separators have weird behavior #27472
  • Runtime doesn't utilize available Ram and crashes #102332
  • Memory footprint decreases when application is launched as a console, but does not when launched through a Windows service #96179

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-rc2] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108091
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108088
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Consider workload band versions stable when we are at rtm #108085
    area-Build-mono, area-Workloads, 10.0.0
  • Remove support for emitting and loading Itanium-64 assemblies #108084
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add sampling profiler #108083
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Give more detail on RyuJIT porting #108080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testing #108077
    needs-area-label
  • [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108067
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Stored the initial capacity of the ConcurrentDictionary for correctly sizing the backing array after clearing the collection. #108065
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix partial compilation for CETCOMPAT mode #108062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] improve local diagnostic of AOT enabled build #108059
    area-Build-mono
  • Add support for (experimental) profile-based trimming #108049
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL define #108048
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • InlineArray design spec/doc #108044
    documentation, needs-area-label

Merged

  • dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108045
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems/String for non-power of 2 choices #107988
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Treat -rtm as stable sdk version band #107997
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, area-Workloads
  • fix broken comment in BitOperations.cs #108056
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Visit blocks in RPO during LSRA #107927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Warn on instrumenting unsupported types for the Fuzzer #108030
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • [PERF] Fix the perf r2rRunType and pgoRunType argument formats for new flow #108038
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up the notes on experimental APIs to simplify for maintenance #107959
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • Modernize C# generation tools under coreclr/inc #106719
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Align the ELF relocation type. #108051
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Handle CultureNotFoundException in AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer #108053
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [NRBF] Remove array allocation when decoding `decimal`s. #107797
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable codeql on official builds #108041
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run our CI source-build legs on CentOS Stream 9 #108042
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make sure we can build with DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT not defined #107108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve OOM kill message #108039
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing params to WhenEach overloads #107964
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    needs-area-label
  • [WASI][draft] UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute on the API surface #107185
    api-needs-work, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix typo #108022
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Swift interop] Add inline array struct lowering tests #107859
    area-Interop-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Fix typo `ConcatinatedString` -> `ConcatenatedString` #108033
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [browser] Fix custom icu fingerprinting. #108025
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicit refs error when CPM is enabled #43604
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Windows.Forms, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' in .Net9-rc1 #43593
  • "csc.dll" exited with code 1 instead of compilation error details, under Linux only #43592
  • [NETSDKE2E][WIX]After configuring the policy key for .NET 9 and set it to nextSession then sign out of the machine and sign back, the net9RC1 Hosting Bundle cannot be removed. #43591
  • [NETSDKE2E][WIX]The installer UI could't pop out after double-clicking NET RC2 application in control panel if setting policy RemovePreviousVersion to a invalid value #43589

Closed

  • dotnet8 <AnalysisLevel> linux #43538
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2, creating 6.0/8.0 Blazor WASM project requires September Servicing (we canceled the ship) feeds #43300

PullRequests

Created

  • insert 9.0.2xx into the codeflow #43608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • License false positive exclusion for zlib cmake file #43603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2542909 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Replace 'xxx' with method has bug #75186
  • Unable to use partial classes with ContinueWith #75184
  • MSBuildWorkspace reports warnings as errors/failures #75182
  • support syntax highlighting for code documentation comments #75181

Closed

  • [Source Generator] Source Generator works with dotnet cli but fails with `TypeLoadException` in VS #75185
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35319.77 #75179

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more better conversions tests #75188
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix reporting of MSBuild warnings in MSBuildWorkspace #75183
    Area-IDE, Community, IDE-MSBuildWorkspace, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #75187
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix the SmartRename button regressions #75134
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #75178
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Yield before performing Go To Definition work #75149
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • More test allocation improvements #75177
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add optional value to dart-lab yml #74953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs #75172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Use MSBuild globs to determine which file changes are relevant #75139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using a Blazor application and Firefox, upon closing the window/application, CircuitHandler OnCircuitClosedAsync is not called. #57996
  • ProducesAttribute seems to ignore named parameters in OpenAPI document generation #57995
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json #57994
  • VS 17.11 - Blazor Unhandled Exceptions - TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'push') #57993
  • GenerateStaticWebAssetEndpointsManifest - An Item with the same key has already been added #57992
    9.0-rc2
  • TemplateBinder strip trailing slash #57988
  • The Rewrite middleware changes middleware ordering #57987
  • dotnet dev-certs unable to find the certificate #57986
  • [GB18030] There is an additional letter "j" when press the "Tab" key multiple times in a MVC project using Chinese characters as the project name. #57983
  • OpenApi polymorphic types missing discriminators #57982
  • UnmappedMemberHandling not working with Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi #57981
  • OpenApi Flags enum not handled correctly #57980
  • OpenApi inline enum for query parameters #57979

Closed

  • .Net 9 RC1 - Cannot set reponse headers when returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #57895
  • Typo in HubConnectionExtensions xml docs #57959
    10.0-preview1
  • Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App targeting .net 9 runs in production mode when started from VS in debug mode #57941
    9.0-rc2
  • OpenApi incorrect inline schema for multi-level objects #57799
    9.0-rc2
  • Critical log on quic connection timeout #57933
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57945
  • Y #57977
  • As soon the "Create movies" page open, keyboard focus starts from outside of the page which is incorrect: A11y_ASP.NET_Movies_Create Movies_Keyboard #56287
    9.0-rc2
  • Visual and programmatic label of "Email" field is not same: A11y_ASP.NET_BlazorWebApp_Register_DevTools #56289
    9.0-rc2
  • Narrator screen reader is not announcing "Please check your email to reset your password" status message: A11y_ASP.NET_Login_ForgetYourPassword_ScreenReader #56294
    9.0-rc2
  • No arm64 installer for .NET 8.0 Windows Hosting Bundle #55180
  • Register Location Changing Handler unexpectedly refresh the application when trying to set a hash #56574
  • Different model binding behaviour for nullable query params with default value in asp net core #57705

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Fix skip condition for IIS tests #57999
    area-networking
  • Simplifying TFA Validation Logic in MapIdentityApi #57989
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Unquarantine fixed tests that have not failed in 30 days #57978
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Add partitioned to cookie for SignalR browser testing #57997
    area-signalr, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix IAsyncEnumerable controller methods to allow setting headers #57924
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix typo in HubConnectionExtensions xml docs #57960
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Check for sentinel value when setting HTTP/3 error code #57934
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [Blazor] Update `WebAssembly.DevServer` to serve the `Blazor-Environment` header #57974
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0-rc2
  • Check for sentinel value when setting HTTP/3 error code #57976
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Update `WebAssembly.DevServer` to serve the `Blazor-Environment` header #57971
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0953a17` to `6dae7eb` #57985
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #57857
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #57975
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix concurrent request handling for OpenAPI documents #57972
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • [TEST] Upload windows event logs #57923
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-commandlinetools, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57840
    area-middleware
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57942
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • List view bad scroll performance due to IconTintColorBehavior in item list template #24850
  • Visual State manager change in behavior in 8.0.90 breaks "Normal" #24849
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Background layer frame mapping has poor performance #24847
    9.0-rc2
  • Border mapping should perform better #24843
    9.0-rc2
  • Making BIndingBase functions not internals #24842
  • [MAUI] RefreshView with listView child page Scroll with jitter #24839
    Backlog
  • [MAUI][iOS18.0] I6 & I9 - Clicking on some pages will throw an exception. #24838
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Disabled Forced Dark Mode Xiaomi phones #24837
  • iOS crash with TestFlight, UseInterpreter no longer working properly with latest .NET8 #24836
    9.0-rc2

Closed

  • Unable to debug on iOS 18 device, Xcode 15.4, lots of warnings #24835
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #24783
  • MAUI .NET 8.0 v 8.0.90 Android WebView with SharePoint page - "We couldn't sign you in. Please try again." followed by "Unknown error." in SharePoint #24840
  • There is No Status message is announced to screen reader users when results are loaded: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Recipes Search_Search box_Status message. #23002
    .NET 8 SR9
  • IOS: Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #8244
    Backlog
  • TabbedPage doesn't change icon colour #23174
    Backlog
  • iOS : Shell FlyoutItem Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons #22032
    Backlog
  • (Un)SelectedTabColor do not work for TabbedPage icons (FontImageSource) on iOS #12250
    Backlog
  • iOS <button> onclick event not firing with linker behavior set to 'Link Framework SDKs Only' #24616
  • Hot reloading a TabBar page (without Shell) duplicates all tabs #24623
  • The width of the label cannot be obtained #24681
  • xcrun -find bitcode_strip is running every time I deploy locally to an iPad #24552
  • Provide more exception source info from the throwing codes #24648
  • maui blazor , js fetch post FREEZE the resonpse #24690
  • MAUI blazor , consequence JS api calling DO NOT WORK #24659
  • Xamarin.Android.D8.targets(87,5): error MSB6006: "java.exe" exited with code 1. #24702
  • file #24719

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update versions on public rc2 #24845
    area-infrastructure
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨

Merged

  • [HybridWebView] fix trimmer warnings on Android #24744
    area-controls-hybridwebview, fixed-in-net9.0-nightly

Updated

  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    area-layout, area-testing, community ✨
  • [macios] Bump .NET 8 to support Xcode 16.0 #24833
  • Fix ShellContent Title doesn't observe changes to bound properties #24806
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Improve MauiFactory performance by avoiding reflection to get base classes #24775
    area-core-hosting, community ✨
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] Add a done button to entry #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage Title property #24781
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24826
    community ✨
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 (take 3) #24822

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking: ArgumentOutOfRangeException in v9-RC1 #34728
  • SaveChangesAsync_accepts_changes_with_ConfigureAwait_true failed #34727
  • UseTransaction() operator to automatically execute a query in a specific isolation level (e.g. split query) #34724
    Backlog
  • Consider ensuring that split query ordering is deterministic, either warning/throwing if not or injecting the primary key properties #34722
    Backlog
  • Including a view with nested properties #34721
  • Runtime Dynamic Global Query Filters (centralized where clauses for entities) #34720

Closed

  • Is it possible to add records in the join table with only the IDs? #34629
  • Seeking for help for RelationalEventId.PendingModelChangesWarning #34726
  • The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties #34725
  • "BUG" ? - Breaking change in EF Core 9 #34693
  • EF 9 Compiled model generate code with errors #34723

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Rename IncludeRootDiscriminatorInJsonId to HasRootDiscriminatorInJsonId #34717
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34719
